attributes.action: Hold a public inquiry into misleading statements made by all sides in the EUvote
attributes.additional_details:
Never should voters face an important decision without informed choice.
Public trust in the institutions of the UK is crucial for an effective government this can only happen if those who abuse that trust are held responsible for their actions and their miss deeds clearly communicated to the population.
To heal the divisions in the UK and to make this country great we must have a system that targets the real problems based on facts not lies.
attributes.background:
Citizens want democracy and control over the laws that apply to them.
This is impossible with the current culture of message manipulation that allows politicians to make such loose use of the truth.
Those responsible for deliberately distorting the truth should be held to account.
